item.title: Berry Brothers interviews Jane Anson
item.description: Berry Brothers Blog interviews critic Jane Anson ahead of her new book, Inside Bordeaux to talk terroir, map-making and why there’s much more to the region than the Classed Growths
item.dc:creator: Justin Purnell

item.title: Vineria Wine Cellar by NS Studio
item.description: The space that captures you, the place where you lose the sense of time, the atmosphere that makes you calm, it’s Vineria, wine cellar in the central part of Old Tbilisi. From a chaotic, busy street we suddenly get into the space that is completely isolated from the city, street, people, noise and creates its own world.
item.dc:creator: Justin Purnell

item.title: Support
item.description: If you have any issues with the app, email us
item.dc:creator: Justin Purnell

item.title: About WineTaster 3
item.description: WineTaster is a modern update to the Classic WINETASTER® app developed by Professor Richard Quandt.
item.dc:creator: Justin Purnell
